mapper.sql: SUB_ACC_CODE, SUB_ACC_NAME, ACC_DATE, MER_ACC_CODE, SUB_CODE, REL_SUB_CODE, BAL_DIR, CCY_CODE, CUR_BAL, AVAIL_BAL, BIZ_FREEZE_BAL, MAG_FREEZE_BAL,PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL, INITIAL_BAL, DEBIT_AMT, CREDIT_AMT, ACC_TYPE, OVER_FLAG, ACC_STATUS, OPEN_DATE, OPEN_BY, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_BY, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY,LAST_INITIAL_BAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} (SUB_ACC_CODE, SUB_ACC_NAME, ACC_DATE, MER_ACC_CODE, SUB_CODE, REL_SUB_CODE, BAL_DIR, CCY_CODE, CUR_BAL, AVAIL_BAL, BIZ_FREEZE_BAL, MAG_FREEZE_BAL,PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL, INITIAL_BAL, DEBIT_AMT, CREDIT_AMT, ACC_TYPE, OVER_FLAG, ACC_STATUS, OPEN_DATE, OPEN_BY, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_BY, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, LAST_INITIAL_BAL) values ( #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAccName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{merAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relSubCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balDir,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ccyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{availBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{initialBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{debitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{openBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{closeBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastInitialBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select:
select
from ${tableName} a where SUB_ACC_CODE = #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} for update WAIT 300
mapper.update:
update ${tableName}
CUR_BAL = #{curBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACC_DATE = #{accDate,jdbcType=DATE},
AVAIL_BAL = #{availBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BIZ_FREEZE_BAL = #{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAG_FREEZE_BAL = #{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL = #{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INITIAL_BAL = #{initialBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEBIT_AMT = #{debitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREDIT_AMT = #{creditAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_INITIAL_BAL = #{lastInitialBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SUB_ACC_CODE = #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ${tableName} t
BIZ_FREEZE_BAL = BIZ_FREEZE_BAL+#{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVAIL_BAL = case when cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal-payable_freeze_bal - #{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} < 0 then 0 else cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal-payable_freeze_bal - #{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} end
where SUB_ACC_CODE = #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BIZ_FREEZE_BAL+#{bizFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >=0

update ${tableName} t
MAG_FREEZE_BAL = MAG_FREEZE_BAL+#{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVAIL_BAL = case when cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal-payable_freeze_bal - #{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} < 0 then 0 else cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal - payable_freeze_bal - #{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} end
where SUB_ACC_CODE = #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MAG_FREEZE_BAL+#{magFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >=0

update ${tableName} t
PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL = PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL+#{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVAIL_BAL = case when cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal-payable_freeze_bal - #{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} < 0 then 0 else cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal - payable_freeze_bal - #{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} end
where SUB_ACC_CODE = #{subAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PAYABLE_FREEZE_BAL+#{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >=0 and cur_bal - biz_freeze_bal - mag_freeze_bal-payable_freeze_bal - #{payableFreezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >=0
